label: Behavior 90852562
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: 'following a curved maritime route forms a small elliptical pattern, approximated by a parametric equation of a circle with radius ~20 meters:, where t ∈ [0,1] represents normalized time over the loop; this reflects the vessel turning in place or adjusting position within a confined harbor area, likely during docking preparation or anchoring'
